EmailTemplate.name: Optimize_Public_Cloud_Spend_Nurture.Optimize_Public_Cloud_Spend_Nurture_2_CIO_Gu
EmailTemplate.subject: Journey to the Cloud, Any Cloud
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/optimize-public-cloud-spend/turbonomic-public-cloud-guide]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
The IT leader that cannot deliver predictable performance while minimizing cost puts their business (and their job) at considerable risk. How is your team managing performance today? How will they guarantee performance in the cloud?
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/optimize-public-cloud-spend/turbonomic-public-cloud-guide]]>
Check out our free guide <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/optimize-public-cloud-spend/turbonomic-public-cloud-guide]]> to learn more about how you can manage your public cloud strategy to minimize spend.
We hope you find it helpful! Regards, Team Turbonomic
